ICPC Zagazig Training

ICPC Zagazig University Community

The ICPC Zagazig Community is a group of students who are passionate about competitive programming and problem solving. The community aims to create a supportive and collaborative environment where students can learn from each other and develop their abilities. The ICPC Zagazig Community welcomes anyone who wants to join the exciting world of competitive programming and problem solving.

Level 0 Training

Data type - Conditions, Loops, Arrays, Strings, Functions, Recursion.

Training Data

Level 1 Training

Advanced topics and required techniqes, like (Number Theory, Greedy, Binary Search, STLS).
